website_summaries.verdict: In spite of a few issues common to bike lights, no others on today's market offer better quality and design or more reliable customer service.
pros: Emits impressive light – up to 500 lumens on high setting
Rechargeable with 4 light settings and comes with a taillight
Excellent support from the manufacturer when issues arise
cons: Some inconsistencies when it comes to battery life – some lights last longer than others
A few reports of light/charging failure within a few months

customer_reviews.title: Works well in really dimly lit areas, good battery life and has a low battery indicator
customer_reviews.text: Works best in lighting up my path when it gets really dark and that’s what matters to me. The flashing mode on the smaller light is very useful. I’ve installed it beneath my bike seat to improve my visibility on the road. Was easy to install and warned me before the battery died out and lasted a good 15mins which allowed me to complete my ride. Would consider buying it as a gift for my cycling enthusiast friends.
customer_reviews.author: Abhay Bhangale

customer_reviews.title: Great light, but mount is not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: This light works great. It is bright, easy to use, does exactly what the seller says it does. So why only 4 stars? The "rubber band" mounting system just does not work well for me. It is easy to use, quick to attach, and doesn't fall off. My problem is that it moves around and won't stay aimed the way I want it. Every time I turn it on or off, or try to attach the USB charging cable, it moves slightly. If this light came with a rigid clamp type mount, it would get 5 stars from me. The little tail light is also nice, but has the same problem (for me).
customer_reviews.author: OverTheHill

customer_reviews.title: A very bright light
customer_reviews.text: For much of the year, I commute via bike along a partially lit bike path in my city. This headlight was a real game changer for me and I now feel safer and more confident riding after dark. This light is bright, and lights up the whole path in front of me. It attaches and detaches easily and it small enough to fit in my jacket pocket. The battery life has been great so far but will update this review if I run into any issues.
customer_reviews.author: GetOutside2121

customer_reviews.title: Super light for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This light is great! I bought 2 pairs (1 for me and 1 for my wife) and we love them. The front light is plenty bright and it fans out on the road and off to the sides very well without blinding oncoming traffic! The battery life works great. I have used the front light for over 2-3 hours at a time and it was still burning bright so I can't really tell when it will go out. It is also very easy to install and doesn't move when I hit bumps on the road or trail. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery D. Lofgren

customer_reviews.title: Light NO LONGER WORKS
customer_reviews.text: At first the design was nice and sleek looking the battery appeared to be recharging nicely all systems a go. HOWEVER - I needed my light last night and it would not work. It appears to be fully charged, but barely emits enough light to light anything. i used this light maybe 20 times or less since February 2018. I feel it should have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: SuperLimo

customer_reviews.title: Changed review after few months of use**
customer_reviews.text: After using the light sparsely, basically only after I ride after dark - which is not often, I noticed that no matter how well the light is charged it still will light up and then shut off after about a minute, with a red light indicator on the power button, as if I hadn’t just charged it for two hours. (Previous review) I love how easy it is to put on and take off. Love that it is rechargeable. Love that it’s made with quality. And I love that it’s made and sold in the US. I don’t have to worry about unreliable, cheaply made, products from China.
customer_reviews.author: Vegayogi

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold a charge. I charge this and then ...
customer_reviews.text: Won't hold a charge. I charge this and then use it for fifteen minutes on low, leave it turned off on my handlebar and come back the next day to a dead light. No bueno. The tail light seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Mason

customer_reviews.title: Bright, but loses charge when stored
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me, you don't need a bike light every day. I like to have it available for occasional (monthly) use though. This light is wonderfully bright when charged via a micro USB cable. However, when unused, the battery completely loses it's charge in under a month. I have not measured the exact time-to-discharge while unused, but it has happened multiple times. No other bike light I've used has had this issue.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: I use it night and day. Powerful, and thoughtful design.
customer_reviews.text: Opens up a lot of night-time bike trails for me, unlike the last couple lites I suffered with. It's a major safety upgrade,..so much so that I'm here getting another for my wife's bike. Oh, and the red tail light is the same good quality, a sweet bonus. I like the rubber mounting system, too. The light stays put, but very easy to tip it down/up for oncoming bikes, or at red lights if you don't want to blind cars for any length of time. And bonus, the lite pops off easily for use in the garage or camping, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nath

customer_reviews.title: The perfect light!
customer_reviews.text: This head light works perfect for my Trek. The adjustable strap allows it to sit on about any handlebar. The head light is BRIGHT. I feel safe using this headlight not only because in can see everting around me but others can’t miss me! I really like that it comes with a tail light too. Saves you the hassle of finding that separate. I had to contact the seller for some customer service. They did an outstanding job of replying to me and taking care of me. Very happy with this brand and product!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Contreras

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a good bright light that is easy for me to remove ...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good bright light that is easy for me to remove and reinstall to prevent theft while I leave my bike outside a store. I thought the "rubber bands" with this light would make it ideal for my purpose, but since the bands are super-tight to hold the light in place without bouncing around going over bumps, the tightness prevents easy removal and installation, especially if your hands are somewhat arthritic. Otherwise, this light may deserve a 5 star rating from bicyclists who don't have the same objective as mine.
customer_reviews.author: E.D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The front light is very bright and has multiple settings, which is nice. The first time I charged it, the light lasted roughly 90 minutes. Since then, I charge it and the light will last 2 or 3 minutes, then nothing. I have used different charges, charged it overnight, and still no luck. Basically, same story for the back red light except after two uses, it will not turn on at all. So disappointed!!!! I wish I had kept the box so I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Worked great....once
customer_reviews.text: I loved the headlight. It was easy to adjust, mounted easily to my bike, and was bright enough to ride at night. My primary use was for daytime riding in flashing mode for safety. Charged it after I received it, and it lasted approx. 7-8 hrs, which was great. But, when I went to recharge it, it no longer worked. It felt like the micro USB port was a little loose. It wasn't dropped and no crashes. Just some typical bumps in the road. I'm glad it failed within the return period.
customer_reviews.author: Igman

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for a while.
customer_reviews.text: Brightness and mounting system are great, but the flashing mode for daylight commuting already doesn't work after less than a year of use. Even with a full charge, I will turn it on and after 5-10 flashes, it will just turn off, which makes it useless for my commute and loses the benefit of visibility for safety. Full light mode still works, but it's too bright for day driving and has distracted drivers, and then the battery dies too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Beland

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Product quality seems good, like the various light strobe functions for the headlight and taillight. Jury is still out on the longevity of the charge as I haven't used the product much. Only real suggestion to the seller, Yes, we get your emails and most of us will fill out the survey. We don't need more emails filling up our in boxes to remind us to fill out the reviews. If it's good, people will fill it out. Please limit the number of emails sent to your customers. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Joel Warren

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I spent $70 on a rear and front light for my other bike and it works great but I could have spent half that by buying this one as it's just as good... in fact, I'd say it's better. The lights are super bright. It's super easy to install (and if you're walking into a store, you can take them off in a second and put them in your pocket if you're worried someone might steal them). Great product... definitely worth every penny. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: CMan

customer_reviews.title: Short life span (9 months) in my case
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very bright and head light has a decent battery life (1.5 to 2 hours). Tail light is compact and has extremely long battery life in flash mode (over 10 hours) Cons: The headlight is kind of big and goofy looking. The real problem is this headlight only lasted 9 months before it died. The tail light is not very bright but serves as a good back up because it keeps going forever.
customer_reviews.author: Primalurges

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: My inquiry was addressed right away by the seller and they are sending me a replacement. Excellent customer service. -------- I commute every day and used this light often in the winter months. It worked well and was nice and bright. However, mounting system is not designed well; very difficult to mount it and it fell off my bike many times. Also, it stopped working completely after only 8 months of use. I've contacted the company to get a replacement and will update my review when I hear from them. I'm assuming they will replace fully at no cost after such a short time but will see.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Busnach

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product that unfortunately could not be effectively attached to my Zip, flat top edge, graphite handlebars. The mounting base for the headlight is designed to be attached to a tubular shaped handlebar and so would not securely attach to my set up. I e-mailed the seller and "Alex" immediately responded and volunteered that he would refund the cost of the entire system. I was not expecting this outcome but needless to say they have a customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Best light, must read, more than a 5 star light!!!
customer_reviews.text: I felt the need to revise my review, as I didn’t give it justice. This light is great! Amazingly brite and the mounting straps to me are a great idea. They are easy to put on and take off. The design is super sexy and goes great with my Specialized RockHopper. Customer service sent email with contact info, send card with more contact info. The shipping was fast and packaged in a nice solid box..this light is a must have. For the price it’s definitely 5 stars.. Btw this set holds a charge beyond a week, for me at least. And I bike 30 minutes daily to work Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Riggse

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and product!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of these bike lights. Two for gifts and one for myself. The two that I gave as gifts have worked great and the people are really happy with how bright they are, and how long they last. Last year my bike light lost all of its intensity for some reason. I wrote to the company about it and they said they would replace it with a new one!! It was an absolute pleasure working with this company! I would recommend them to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruben and Jackie V

customer_reviews.title: Headlight is great except it interferes with heart rate sensors
customer_reviews.text: I like the construction and durability of the headlight. It seems like it will handle rain OK. The straps cover a range of handlebar diameters. I have a wide handlebar with lots of padding and it still fits. I use it in flashing mode at dawn and dusk to be more visible and it's great for that. However, whether in steady or flashing mode, it prevents my heart rate chest straps from transmitting to my handlebar mounted bike computers. I have 2 different computers and the failure is the same. The rear light seems fine, I haven't used it much.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Amundson

customer_reviews.title: Pride in product
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving my lights I was immediately impressed by the packaging. The lights come in carefully designed box. So many inexpensive products arrived packed in the cheapest conceivable packaging. That this manufacturer affords the time and expense to properly package its product communicates to me pride in its product. This impression was reinforced by a visit to its website. This is a very bright light. I caution purchasers against looking directly into in when it is in its brightest mode. It's blinding. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Wishwasbiking

customer_reviews.title: battery life indicator not always helpful
customer_reviews.text: Headlight: It's solidly built, mounts easily, has a decent beam pattern, and is bright enough. The only problem I have is that the warning for low battery (A couple of blinks of the beam and button changes from blue to red) sometimes occurs only a few minutes before complete shut-off. I just tested it inside at medium power and got 19 minutes - which is reasonable. I think this is a cold weather problem. The tail light is bright enough only in a small, excessively focused, area. I wouldn't want it as my only tail light.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: One of the best if not the best.
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is awesome. Really bright light. I can’t imagine I won’t be seen in the dark by passing cars. Build quality is nice too. Button/switch works well for me. No hanky panky. I’ve been using it for a while though I haven’t bike much in the past summer. It looks kool too. I wish they’re a little cheaper though so I can mount 2 on my bike, but that’s just me. Overall this is a quality bike necessity wether you’re biking daylight or nigh time. Good job cycle torch
customer_reviews.author: C.Partey

customer_reviews.title: Really great quality and very easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 headlight and rear light bike sets. One was a shark brand, and the other was a cheaper one that was half the price of a shark. I put the cheaper one on my bike first. The headlight worked, but it seemed so flimsy, and it was hard to install. Next, I started getting the Shark Cycle Torch and putting it on my son's bike. Wow the quality was way better, I could just tell instantly, and it was super easy to install. LIterally took me 5 minutes. The headlight is very bright at night. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: easy to attach
customer_reviews.text: Bright light, easy to attach, and seems to last more than long enough (about 40 minutes for me) to get me safely home. (It probably can shine longer, but I plug it in each night after getting home.) A great deal for the price when compared to the cost of a helmet-mounted light. What I would like to see is a switch for the tail light that is not so sensitive: if I put the tail light in a pocket or a bag when not needed, it will inevitably bump against something and turn itself on.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Meier

customer_reviews.title: So Far so Good - Bright Light
customer_reviews.text: This light is incredibly bright and the brightness is more than adequate on all the settings. The original light sent didn't charge correctly. Contacted seller and received a replacement quickly, which works great. The mounting system is so easy to use unlike others where you need a tool to take off. Because the light needs periodic charging, the rubber mounting strap makes removal quick and uncomplicated. The rear light is just as effective in spite of its size and uses a rubber strap.
customer_reviews.author: James Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Worked right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light for the price. Right out of the box it worked great, very bright. Rode for an hour in 15 degree temps and had no issues. The only downside to this light is the shape of the face that I'm guessing is why they named it the "Shark". It casts a shadow right in front of the wheel. Not a big issue but noticeable at low speed. You adjust the light down a little more than you'd like to but for the price and the brightness of the light, it's not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Spinnwisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to the road bike!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product right out of the box with enough charge to sample it on a 10mile road. I have it mounted on a Giant Defy road bike. Very easy installation on and off the bike with the supplied rubber straps, yet VERY sturdy. You can easily place the headlight at the angle you desire while riding and it stays put! The red taillight is a nice addition that easily attaches to your saddle stem. The beam of the light is beautiful giving plenty of light for a night ride even on medium brightness!
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good light for riding
customer_reviews.text: After my previous light died and I found out they didn't sell it anymore (shame because it was amazing) I had to find a new light. After a few terrible purchases, I finally found this light. It mounts easily on my road bike and is bright enough to allow me to see enough of the road ahead when going down a hill at 30+mph. The only downside is that on longer rides (2.5+ hours) I noticed it would die on me towards the end of the ride . Luckily the sun had risen substantially at that point that it wasn't a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tiusty

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, bright - if you want to be seen, this is the device
customer_reviews.text: Have these on two Giant cruisers. The wife and I head N. on occasion at early evening and return to the house 830-930. During the winter months that time frame is pretty dark. Previously had a Bell light config and was not happy with AA battery life and brightness. This USB powered light creates a light that must be visible for over a mile as well as the red rear light. You will be seen in the dark with this light config. Verdict is out regards battery life.
customer_reviews.author: jar

customer_reviews.title: Good lights at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Headlight is VERY bright. Very lightweight. Decent battery life. Nice light modes (various light levels, flashing, oscillating). Cons: The tail of the headlight sticks out far enough beyond where the strap attaches that it can be hard to fasten it securely. Well the tail light remembers it’s previous mode, the headlight doesn’t, which is disappointing. Overall, a great product that I would happily buy again. Minor redesigns would make it even better!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bill

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this bike light.
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, and lasts well over an hour on a full charge. Casts a bright and distinctive beam that rivals that of some cars. Mounts and dismounts easily from the bike. The only downside of this product is that the front light button lights up bright blue when the light is on. If you're riding in pitch black, this blue light is bright enough to be distracting. I placed a layer of black duct tape over it to fix the issue. I'd buy it again nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: John Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Nice setup ..
customer_reviews.text: My scooter has an oblong center bar and not every mount will fit it, since most are made for circular bars. This one was perfect in that is more adjustable and not JUST FOR CIRCULAR BARS. Unlike many, this light is a bright as it says. Bright enough for total darkness, to see bumps in your path. I hope the taillight into my helmet and it shine bright as well. I like that they both have variable lighting effects too.
customer_reviews.author: Blunt Honesty.

customer_reviews.title: Great for gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father’s birthday to go on a bike he bought from a family friend whom had moved out of state for work. Given that the time for biking is essentially over (days getting shorter and cooler) given that it’s late in the year, he won’t be able to fully utilize the lights until next year. He did, however, cycle through the different settings of the lights to see how it looks and was impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Haitsma

customer_reviews.title: Great, bright light
customer_reviews.text: This light is exactly as described. It is bright, multi-mode, rechargeable, and priced really well. It also includes a small, but bright, multi-mode rechargeable rear light. Mounting is simple using the rubber strap. It is great for road use, however, I am not sure if it would hand on to a mountain bike. Something more permanently fixed to the handlebar would be required. I would not hesitate to purchase this light again. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Messy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Mine was delivered on oct as a present for spouse bday which is today and light fell apart. I’m out of the return time frame. Very disappointed. My spouse excitement turned to disappointed 😥 Amazon says will notify seller 1 -2 business days. We watched the video which showed sturdiness but ours fell apart for no reasons. Put a damper on birthday gift
customer_reviews.author: CNN

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Bright!!!!  Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this returning from work on his Bike (2 miles in pitch black conditions) and said it is an amazing light. He loves it and it gives an indication of when a charge is needed. Very happy with this and pleased with the safety such a bright light adds to his ride home. I will buy from this manufacturer again and have made many recommendations to friends already. Thanks Amazon for making this a Prime item too!
customer_reviews.author: Family of Five

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding battery life
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, and lasted my 1 hour commute with no sign of fading. Easy to adjust while riding (I dip for oncoming traffic as I've seen some of these blazing torches in action as a driver, and they're blinding). Mounts firmly, comes with several mounting straps to fit many sizes of handlebar, stable and lightweight. I haven't had it in the rain yet. Excellent value for money (I've spent twice as much on headlights that only last 20mins on full). Came beautifully packaged for transport, and arrived safely. Bonus rear light is small but bright and I've added it to my rear flashing light collection. I would definitely recommend this item as a commuter light given it's excellent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, even on low!
customer_reviews.text: The pattern of this light is really cool; it doesn't shine on your front tire, which is awesome, and projects plenty far ahead. The mounting could be improved, but it does what it needs to. It's like I have legit headlights on my bike now. Took it out tonight for a ride on some trails, and the hotspot shines right down the middle, but there's enough cast to the sides that you can see curves and rocks, etc. I was able to very confidently ride some easy trails. UPDATE: The light is made of plastic and easily broke when a person fell into my bike, switched to an aluminum one, 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Johnny 5

customer_reviews.title: Works Great & Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in October 2018 and it is super. VERY bright, easy to use and easy to re-charge. I had a problem with it in August, 2019. I sent an email to Cycle Torch and they had a replacement in my hands in 48 hours. Customer service doesn't get any better than that.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ehrlich

customer_reviews.title: Battery Died After One Cycle
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of confidence in this product when I purchased it based on the positive reviews. When I received the product, the battery was at around 60%. I fully charged the headlight immediately. About a week later, when the battery had discharged, I charged it again. However, after hours of charging, the red indicator light never turned off and the light won't turn on for more than a few seconds. I know the charger is functional, so I think I have a faulty battery. I'm waiting for Cycle Torch to return my email, but I'm not looking forward to the downtime, as my bike is my primary mode of transportation.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis M.

customer_reviews.title: bright
customer_reviews.text: I can only give this light 4 stars because it is a xmas gift for my grandson and of course he hasn't seen it yet. This was the fastest delivery ever- ordered it one day received it the next. Super sleek looking and the light is very bright. The mounting system looks very simple. I will be writing another review after christmas to give it 5 stars because I am sure my grandson will love it.
customer_reviews.author: joyce smith

customer_reviews.title: Bright and durable
customer_reviews.text: Front light is really bright--generally freezes traffic about to pull out in front of me. I use flash mode during the day and get several hours of use between charges--no complaints there. Rear is so-so--better than nothing but not nearly as bright as the Cygolight I prefer to use. I don't think the rear would be sufficient on fast roads or in bright sunlight. I've owned the Shark for a year or so and used in the rain several times. So far, reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Jaydee

customer_reviews.title: Great light, so bright that i can feel safe ...
customer_reviews.text: Great light, so bright that i can feel safe on my road bike! The only reason i am rating 2 stars is because the light stopped turning on even the battery is fully charged! I think it is the light bulb burn or something! Update: I am rating this company 5 stars changing my rating from 2 stars as they quickly responded to the issue I had with light! Great customer service! I bet you it must be a defective batch of this amazing light that causing this issue as I saw other complained about the same issue recently!
customer_reviews.author: Adam36

customer_reviews.title: Mounting could be improved
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been a great light for commuting. Super bright! I've even been asked by other riders what brand it was. It dimmed on me once, indicating it needed to be charged, but didn't go out. The mounting is just rubber straps, but how they clip on to the light could be made a little easier if the hooks were slightly larger. Not a deal breaker though. Overall happy with it. Note the rear light is pretty small but hopefully does the job.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: What a light. Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this combo, I bought my wife one for Christmas and when I saw it I ordered myself one as well. This light is super bright and the strobe is darn near blinding. I ride our trail system is total darkness and it lights up everything. The rubber straps are a must for Aero Bikes such as Time Trials as the frames and handle bars are more of an oval shape. The only thing I would like to see is more flashing options for the rear, but I'm just being picky .
customer_reviews.author: ViennaDisco

customer_reviews.title: Bright but poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Impressive brightness but very limited battery life. I'm curious to see how well the LED maintains that level of brightness over time as other reviews have mentioned issues there. Still, it's been working well for the last two months with use about 3 times a week. Relatively light which is a good indicator of a smaller battery as well. That part is annoying and having to charge at least every other use
customer_reviews.author: Graham Moon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for riding at night.  UPdated
customer_reviews.text: outstanding headlight. amazing value. the shape of the beam is much better for cycling than a typicaly round flashlight .The flash/blink mode is very effective for daytime use. The rubber strap adjusts easily to different handlebar diameters which makes it quick and easy to install securely for bumpy rides and allows quick removal when locking the bike at a public place. I strongly recommend this light. 9/18/2017 update light stopped functioning. Contacted Andrew at Cycletorch and he's sending me a replacement despite being a week past warranty. Excellent customer service, to back up a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: kinzie

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Not good for storing in a travel bag.
customer_reviews.text: Love this set. I can see well in the dark and I love how I can charge them using an USB cable. They are sensitive to the touch. If you bump them they will turn on. I would like to see a “lock” feature so when I store them in my bag they don’t come on when bumped. Hence 4 stars. I can’t mount them when I wear cycling gloves. I need to use bare hands.
customer_reviews.author: Soccer Mom

customer_reviews.title: The worst lights I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this product less than a year and it's very faulty. I'm an avid commuter in Oregon and rarely bike at night so I don't use it as much as I should and the headlight is glitchy. The light adjustments don't even work anymore and the battery life is garbage. Don't waste your money. You're better off spending less on another brand than this.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Bright, easy to charge, easy to install - great light set!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised - this is a bright light. Not just "legal" bright, you can actually see where you're going. In fact don't be surprised if oncoming traffic blinks their brights at you. The tail light is just as good and easy to mount. Overall both pieces are easy to charge and easy to mount with the straps. Very satisfied with the Shark 500 set.
customer_reviews.author: bigkahuna42

customer_reviews.title: Shine some light on it!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this light set for my new hybrid. If the packaging is any indication of the quality of the light, I am expecting this one to be excellent. Right out of the box, it was obvious that this light had a lot of quality built into it. The appearance, construction, finishing, and controls are all well done. Both the head and tail lights came with their own USB charging cable which was nice. And the built-in charging indicators are a nice touch too. This light has strong center illumination, and good peripheral illumination. Well worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Burk

customer_reviews.title: White Light is Fantastic, Red Bulb Discharges Very Quickly
customer_reviews.text: The headlight is superb, with multiple ways to use (straight, flash, switch between bright and dim) and the battery life is impressive. Mount is secure and easy to use. The tail light is great - until it discharges, and this happens very quyickly. I use the tail light in flash mode and withing about two hours, it's dimming. Buy it for the headlight alone.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas R Townsend

customer_reviews.title: More than meets my cycling needs.
customer_reviews.text: I use this every time I ride. I am amazed by the intensity of this light (torch). I can see it reflecting two blocks away and I have noticed that drivers notice me far better than before I used the light. It easily has enough lifetime on a charge to meet my needs (I often ride for over an hour.) The only detraction to this at all is the lack of a quick disconnect. Each time you must struggle to get the rubber strap off. But it's not enough to lower the 5 stars. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Layne

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have used it few times in the late evening after sunset. Beam is powerful enough to see in front and reflect nicely from all road signs. I am going to buy one more set for my wife's bike which we had recently purchased. It fits snugly on the handle bar and I never had issues with bumps. I must say I have street bike but I think grip is tight enough that it will hold on gravel road or other rough surface.
customer_reviews.author: Arun Singh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !
customer_reviews.text: To be honest I was real disappointed when I open the product. It was a lot smaller than I had imagined and I thought it was just going to be like another little weak flash light. Then I turned it on in a darkened room and Wow ! This thing is incredibly bright ! It covers a nice wide area too. The rubber attachement to my handlebar is also great, not like the hard bulky plastic one that prevents my folding handle bar from collapsing all the way. So happy with my choice !
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Stephens

customer_reviews.title: good while it worked
customer_reviews.text: Although I have had this product for between one and two years, it was only used about 10 times. Never in heavy rain or in freezing weather. (I only bike commute on nice days). The light just decided to stop charging. It probably sat for a month after the last use and never worked again. At least the tail light still works but can I trust it ?
customer_reviews.author: Demetra Irene Weaver

customer_reviews.title: GREATEST bike light made
customer_reviews.text: extremely good bike light. WOW it is amazing it shines a long way and the beam is just right for my bike even at speed on trails it works great it has enough side light to see obstacles and the center is really bright. I cant say enough about the light is truly wonderful you would be a FOOL not to buy one. this is the best light you can buy no mater the price. the free tail light is awesome. the guys that make these know what they are doing and make a FINE product
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely bright on most settings, even in dimmest setting ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely bright on most settings, even in dimmest setting cars flash their lights. Battery charge varies according to temperature. At -20f with full charge, light drops to lower level, several minutes later it goes to flashing and halfway on the daily 4-mile ride it powers down. If you buy this and ride in cold weather, charge it on daily basis. Followup: Bought Nov 2017, by Dec 2018 light no longer accepts charging. Changed cable(s) connecting to PC/Laptop and APC did not resolve issue. For almost $50.00 I'm disapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Up North

customer_reviews.title: 😎
customer_reviews.text: The light is very bright and mounts on and off easily, great for day/night use. The customer service is probably the best thing about this product. I originally purchased the light itself thinking it was the set, but accidently bought the front light only. So I contacted customer service (Alex) about the situation and explained to them, without hesitation they sent me a taillight with no charge even though it was my fault in the first place. They're very accommodating and the products are very well made. I ride trails and commute to work/ school in whatever weather condition. These lights are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Bright and rechargeable but seems to die too quickly
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this light. On one hand, it's bright and has a rechargeable battery. On the other, the method to attach it to the bike takes some getting used to and the battery has died on me several times with no warning (I pull it out of my backpack and it's dead). I wish there was a battery level gauge to quickly see if there was charge or how much charge. As it stands, I just have to preemptively charge it since I don't know when it will die.
customer_reviews.author: Smackmeister

customer_reviews.title: The Brightest Bike Light Ever
customer_reviews.text: The title of this product says it all, "SUPERBRIGHT". It's so bright I rarely, if ever, have it set on the brightest setting. The taillight isn't bad either and has 3 different settings, it's small but also very bright. The batteries for both seem to last a good amount of time, I also like that they use the same charger as my phone. I would give it 5 stars if the power button on the headlight did not have a built in blue LED to indicate it was on, the blue light can be distracting and is unnecessary, so I ended up mounting the headlight upside down. Besides that, I plan to purchase another pair for my girlfriend's bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bright & Rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: I have only had these lights for a week but so far they have worked just fine. I love that that they are rechargeable as opposed to replacing batteries like I have had to do on other lights. Bright enough to see in front of me on early morning rides, and be seen by cars. Only complaint is the little silicone insert for the charging port ripped off first time I tried to charge. Hopefully that doesn't affect the weather integrity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing light for the price, perfect for the commuter on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME!! They really are incredibly bright and the shield puts all that light where it needs to be. I really like the ability to use the same charger that I use for most other devices as I don't have to keep track of any extra peripherals, I just use the same charger for my phone. The rear light is nothing too special, but it's not bad. Amazing lights for the price, I highly recommend these to anyone working within a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Ian B.Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Great product and light for commuting or just riding at night
customer_reviews.text: Bought this light set for my son’s bike. First off, the product packaging is top notch. Upon unboxing, it’s evident it’s a well designed and manufactured product as well. Good materials, and it’s put together well. I’m no lighting expert but I really like the output in the form of brightness and beam pattern. As a parent, I feel better about my teenager riding home from his friends’ houses at night. Customer service appears to really good to. Cycle Torch has already sent a couple of emails to make sure I’m completely satisfied with the their product...and I am.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: No swivel on the base
customer_reviews.text: Ok, a very bright bike light with a critical shortcoming that will make it useless to many cyclists. The mount on the bottom of the light does not swivel , making it useless if you don't have a center location to mount on the handle bars. if you have bag mounted on center a no go. Should be a simple improvement for Cycle torch to make then they would have a great product. Unfortunately i will have to return.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lutzi

customer_reviews.title: blindingly bright
customer_reviews.text: Thus far, I've just used the lights for my commute to/from work today. The headlight is so damn bright it's crazy. Comes with 2 charging cords, which is great. Both lights have multiple brightness and strobe settings. The only thing I don't love is how they just mount with rubber straps. I knew this before buying, so I ain't mad at it, but it leaves a bit to be desired. I prefer a bracket that clamps to the frame that the light can clip in/out of. The lights work great though! At least for the first day. They're doing exactly what I need them to do - help avoid collisions with cars. Let's hope they hold up a while.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Huffman

customer_reviews.title: So far, wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. No instructions were sent with the unit, and we urge anyone to watch the online instructions which are excellent. Several have commented about the longevity of this product, but so far, so good. Both lights appear to be well built, the switches seem solid to the touch. One of our former cell phone chargers works just great to do the charging. It is our opinion, these (front and rear) bike lights should be given your serious consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. ARthur

customer_reviews.title: I can see this light reflected back at me from road signs that are easily 100 yards out
customer_reviews.text: I can't get over this thing! At dusk, I can see this light reflected back at me from road signs that are easily 100 yards out, maybe more. If you're riding on a path you will annoy other riders and walkers if you have this pointed at eye level. This isn't a complaint (it's super easy to adjust the angle on the fly with rubber connecting strap), it's just another way of saying that this light will get people's attention. You could spend much much more on a light for commuting if you like, but you don't need to. I've only had the light for about 6 weeks, I'll update if there's any problem with longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Awakening

customer_reviews.title: Horrible mounting system.  Light moves around and will point down in rough road.
customer_reviews.text: You are paying premium price for a nice light that uses a glorified rubber band to hold the light in place. The same mounting system used on cheap $5 lights. This thing moves around on my bar when I hit rough roads. Going to macgyver something in the meantime to positively hold it in place yet be removable for charging DO NOT BUY. I would have given 1 star but the light itself is decent,
customer_reviews.author: George I.

customer_reviews.title: Lights only work when plugged in - near useless
customer_reviews.text: The lights only work when charging. You know how I know? Without pressing any buttons and just putting the lights on a charger, they work but you can't turn them off only change between settings while on the charger. I have tried 10 second holds different combinations, and nothing when unplugged.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Bright flashes get car driver's attention, keeping you safe.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! A set of bright, flashing lights to alert drivers to my presence on the street. There's a clear difference in the awareness of vehicle drivers when I have the headlight set to flash. They make eye contact with me, whereas in the past they didn't. Want to improve your personal safety when riding? Get these rechargeable lights. I get many hours out of a charge, recharging every couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Mark SA Smith

customer_reviews.title: See me!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just a scaredy cat these days so I ride with lights a blazing day or night. Since I ride on windy mountain roads, I'm often in the shade - the bright headlight has saved my life on more than one occasion. I use the tail light on my helmet - but would have them all over my bike if I could. My one complaint is the attachment device. Jeezus H. Krispy Kreme - you practically need a crow bar to pull the rubber band over the tube. Othe than that I think I'll get another set!
customer_reviews.author: Ramona d'Viola

customer_reviews.title: Rear light broke after one time using
customer_reviews.text: the rear light did only work once then is broke. I reported to Amazon and then Amazon contacted the manufacturer, who never responded. Amazon gave me return labeL. IT SEEM SPOOR QUALITY AND POOR SERVICE FORM MANUFACTURER, BUT NOT FROM AMAZON THEY WERE OK HOPEFULLY GET THE REFUND AFTER SENDING
customer_reviews.author: Mister Tony

customer_reviews.title: the product is solid ( im a cycler - we ...
customer_reviews.text: the product is solid ( im a cycler - we ride nights as a group ) very strong flood beam, attachment is solid as well no complaints with product However For some unknown reason it did not light on after 7 months. (it charged-but no light), contacted Mevell via Amazon, got response within 1hr and replacement sent to me in couple days. They stand by their product buy with confidence! thanks Mevell
customer_reviews.author: Chewbacca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect illumination for urban riding.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great lighting system for urban riding. The headlight throws a bright beam of light on the road surface. The system that attaches the lights to the bike is easy to use, and leaves nothing on the bike when the lights are removed. The charge on the rechargeable batteries lasts quite long, and you save money by not having to buy non-rechargeable batteries. And the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: James Morrell

customer_reviews.title: Super bright
customer_reviews.text: This light is super bright! I also love how easy it is to take on and off the bike, as my husband and I will both use it, and it fits tight. I have had other lights that fly off when you are biking, and this one is secure. Also I enjoy the fact that it charges via USB instead of batteries, so saves me money in the long-run, as I bike almost daily. I have went through so many batteries with other lights, and wasted so much money. I have used this in the dark, and it works perfectly and I was able to make it home safely.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great light for riding at night
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light so I can continue riding now that its gets dark so early. The light is excellent for this. I also like the flashing strobe which I use during the day just to make sure drivers see me. The strobe is powerful. I have a triathlon bike so mounting was difficult because of the tri bars but I mounted it upside down on the handle bar and it works fine this way.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Best light ever
customer_reviews.text: I ride my bike on a heavily used bike trail that is totally tree covered. So it is dark every during the day and my new light works great! I had people comment that they can see me from a 1/4 mile away. I ride about an hour a day and only recharge the light every other week.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Grega

customer_reviews.title: Good at first but didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light in October 2018. I only used the front light through the winter when I was going to and from work in the dark. It worked well from October 2018 to March 2019. I put it away for the summer and started using it again in October 2019. Since November it WILL NOT HOLD A CHARGE. At first the total running time was about 30min before needing a charge, and now It only works for a total of 15min before completely quitting. Good value at first, but if it only lasts for 9months it's definitely not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Easily my favorite bike light
customer_reviews.text: Man this thing is great! It's plenty bright, even at 50% power, and it's very well designed. It attaches easily to my handlebars, and the parts are grippy enough that I don't have to pull the elastic very tight to be sure it will stay in place. And once it's on, the switch is programmed for maximum safety. No matter what level of brightness you're using, the first time you touch the switch it goes to maximum brightness and then you can dim it down by repeated button presses. But you can't accidentally turn it off: you have to hold the switch down for a couple of seconds before it will shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Steve from Boston

customer_reviews.title: The visibility is amazing with the headlight
customer_reviews.text: This headlight and brake light are definitely worth the price. Very simple installation, plus the light fits on any size handle bar with the adjustable straps. I was skeptical of many bike head lights due to my over-sized handle bars on my road hybrid, but this product solved that problem!! The visibility is amazing with the headlight. The 4 different settings are perfect for any occasion. In my opinion, the light provides equal benefit compared to a car head light - the visibility is clear and amazing. Overall I am satisfied with the product and would recommend to anyone searching for the perfect headlight for the thrilling night rides.
customer_reviews.author: Alex P.

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: The cycle torch has is very unreliable. I bought 2 of these. The first one died within months and the second one just stopped working after a year of purchasing this item. I exclusively use it for biking and it just doesn't cut it. The brightness is good and is easy to mount onto your bike, however the battery dies within 2 dies of fully charging it until it just doesn't work any more. I will not buy this again nor recommend this torch to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Johel

customer_reviews.title: Get this light, perfect for road biking
customer_reviews.text: This is a really excellent light. The only thing that could be different is having the blue "on" indicator light on top is a bit bright that needs to be. But that's easily fixed with some electric tape or something. Feels like a quality product and works like one too. Dont spend 80+ for something else that's of comparable quality.
customer_reviews.author: Josephkay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light so I could ride my 140cc trail bike at night time. Awesome product for something that's so small, when I opened the box I thought, oops what a waste of money, that was until I charged it up and attached it to my bike, unbelievably bright and lasts on the brightest mode for around 3 hours... Charges extremely quickly wether plugged into a charger or computer via USB. I paid a little extra for priority shipping, was amazed when it arrived in Sydney in only 4 days. I would highly recommend buying this product for any kind of night time activity, could definitely use it for many other things other than cycling....
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: This is a good light, I bought this just over a year ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good light, I bought this just over a year ago and I've used it each time from full to depleted almost every weekend since. I think its now at end of life as it has stopped keeping charge, the backlight is still going strong, this runs out of juice 15-30 minutes into a ride after being charge to full (blue light).
customer_reviews.author: ansel cadien

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Relatively inexpensive but appears to be quality construction. Lightweight, compact, throws a powerful beam to light the way or just a bright beam for longer battery life. Front and back lights offer blinking mode to make them highly visible in daylight. They advertise water-resistant. I haven’t tried that. Attaching is quick with stretch bands. But probably easy to steal, so remove when you lock up the bike. Seller promptly reached out to verify satisfaction. I interpret that to indicate good customer service. All things considered, I highly recommend this cycle light.
customer_reviews.author: Accountant in NY

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Have only had a chance to use it once or twice so far but it certainly seems to work well. The headlight is very bright and its position on the handlebar adjusts easily. The lights are readily removed for recharging but I don't have a feel yet for how often that will be required. I ordered a 3.1 amp usb charger at the time I purchased the unit. Then, when I received the unit, I noted that the instructions said not to use a charger with more than 2 amps. I wish the company had noted that fact in their marketing materials. I wouldn't have gone out and purchased a 3.1 amp charger that I probably shouldn't use.
customer_reviews.author: joan cotton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Ilumination
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this bike light compared to others. It feels like you have a headlight, and friends who forgot their lights can use your illumination on a bike trail to get home safely. One star short. Hubby bought the same bike light and it does not stay charged for him. :(
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. Bright light. Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Bright light. Affordable. There is no guide about how to correctly tune the angle/direction of light. It should be fairly straight forward, but if you just install the light straight to your handle bar, it shines the light straight forward and not on the ground. I do hope they did make the instruction so users won’t blind others.
customer_reviews.author: Marine C

customer_reviews.title: A Great Detachable Light!
customer_reviews.text: I just throw this light in my backpack. Then, if I end up working late and it becomes dark; I use it. It easily slips onto my handlebar and stays in place. It is bright enough for my quick 15 minute commute. Also, it continues to function well even after some heavy rains.
customer_reviews.author: Atlantico

customer_reviews.title: Nice light set for night riding
customer_reviews.text: I love this torch. It's easy to put on my bike and is extremely bright for safe night riding. It charges easily and seems to be tough but I haven't dropped it or anything yet. The rear red light is a bit dinky so I got a better one to ride with but it is clearly visible at night. They both have progressively brighter lights and a flash mode.
customer_reviews.author: Darell H.

customer_reviews.title: Visibility is so much better with the lighter cars
customer_reviews.text: This works very well on morning rides where it off is foggy. I use the flashing mode for these rides with a visibility from a long way off. It feels so much safer than riding without. All you need to do is look at cars while out driving and notice the difference between those that have their lights on and those that do not. Visibility is so much better with the lighter cars. I did do one early morning bike ride in the dark and it did a pretty good job for this too, but if I did that more often I might want a brighter light but have limited experience in that area.
customer_reviews.author: Charles G. Cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Great light for commuting!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this light set for my daily bike commute and couldn't be happier. The mounting system on the front light is a little awkward but not a reason to not buy the light. Both front and rear lights are very bright and can be seen from a significant distance. I charge my lights every day but I also tested them and found that both last about 3-4 days worth of commuting use between charges not that I would take the chance of running them out of battery during a night ride. You should buy this light, it lights up the road and is a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Bright + Rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: We love our Cycle Torch Shark! Happy to receive a two in one bright light in front and blinking red light for the back :) My boyfriend and I each bought a set and it came through for us for our night rides together. You can easily point the light down or move it up for farther distance viewing. We kind of like to do a combination of both when we can ride side by side. We have so much fun beating the heat and riding at sunset and into the night and this mechanism makes this possible!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product with a short life
customer_reviews.text: The first one suddenly die out only lasted 4 months, the second one well it’s like it drains very fast and the high beam wouldn’t come on Something is wrong with its structure and being so sturdy and solid is like you can’t save your investment from trash.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Great light + customer service
customer_reviews.text: I really love this light; I use it for camping because it’s so dang bright and it lasts a long time. The modes are simple and easy. The low light is still pretty bright which is nice because you’re getting the lumens without losing the battery life. Unfortunately, I had lost my light after it got stolen. After getting in contact with the great customer service team and letting them know about my situation, they sent me a new light free of charge. It did take a while for them to respond which I’m sure is related to COVID circumstances but I was so happy to know I wouldn’t have to buy a new one again. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Decker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and transferable
customer_reviews.text: The brightness of the headlight is excellent. I love the straps to accommodate any bike. I used the lights on my road bike specifically, but I would use this for my cruiser bike or mountain bike as well. The rechargable route is amazing and holds the charge for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: jenell hilderbrand
